mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGEROOM_NO, SEND_ID, RECEIVE_ID, SEND_TIME, READ_TIME, CONTENT, PHOTO, READ_CHECK FROM MESSAGE WHERE (SEND_ID = #{sendId} AND RECEIVE_ID = #{receiveId}) OR (SEND_ID = #{receiveId} AND RECEIVE_ID = #{sendId}) ORDER BY SEND_TIME ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGEROOM_NO, SEND_ID, RECEIVE_ID, SEND_TIME, READ_TIME, CONTENT, PHOTO, READ_CHECK) VALUES (#{messageNo}, #{messageRoomNo}, #{sendId}, #{receiveId}, #{sendTime}, #{readTime}, #{content}, #{photo}, #{readCheck})
INSERT INTO MESSAGE (SEND_ID, RECEIVE_ID, CONTENT) VALUES (#{sendId}, #{receiveId}, #{content})
